name: STRESS AND WORRY
description: I will help you to get out of your mental pressure. I will help you to create a healthy environment for your mental health. And you will be fine.

name: FAMILY DIFFICULTIES
description: Your family members are your best friend. And I'm gonne help you to believe this. I will help you to make a good relation wtth them.

name: GRIEF AND LOSS
description: Grief is a dangerous thing that could be the worst thing to stop your progress. You need a proper treatment and friendly support. I'm gonna make it sure for you.

name: Friendly Relationship
description: Everyday we live with friends. You should keep your friendship well. You maybe facing some unexpected thing, I'm here for you to make your friendship well.

name: Personal Relationship Problem
description: Maybe you are not passing a great time with your favourite person. Maybe he/she is not loyal to you as you are to her/him. It's a common problem in the society now a days.

name: Official Problem
description: You are not having a great working environment in your office ? Or maybe you are not doing well in your job. You can be fired at any time?
